storyInfo: It turns out that the Pioneers have been trying to make their way into the lab from the very beginning, believing Dorothy to be the origin of the mysterious creatures. While they swing into action, the creatures appear to demonstrate sentience, moving to protect Dorothy.

attributes.content: Muelsyse...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Urgh... nngh...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I never expected to see you here.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Sorry...?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I would have killed you if the Doctor didn't warn me.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Is that what the enemy wanted? Did they want you to murder your former colleague?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Not necessarily.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: It wasn't just because of the Doctor that I stayed my hand.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: She said, 'Don't be too eager to make an enemy of anyone.' She was alluding to Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: That would explain her behavior.;She was guiding us to Muelsyse.

attributes.content: She wanted us to find her?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: But one wrong move, and we might've killed Muelsyse...
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Alright, I get it. She doesn't care if Muelsyse lives or dies.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: She's treating this as a test.;She wants Saria to act quicker.

attributes.content: A test of the power armor technology, and a test to see how Rhodes Island and I react.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Every word she said in the bar was calculated to probe my response.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: She's guiding us in the direction that she wants.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Ugh...!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Feeling better, Muelsyse?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You were injected with a sedative a few hours ago, but you'd regained consciousness by the time we saw you in the power armor.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The nausea and numbness that you feel are mainly lingering effects of hypoxia and extreme stress.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I patched you up a little, but it'll take you another half hour or so to fully recover.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Stop... stop...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Stop?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Stop... who?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The one who put you in the power armor?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The Liberi?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Muelsyse begins sweating from her brow and the back of her hand.
She grabs your hand, and the drops of sweat rise into the air, splashing against your clothing.
The stain quickly spreads to form a message.
It is not the name of the Liberi, nor of Ferdinand.
Site 359.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Not often I see you here.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You did give me a temporary work permit, didn't you?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: 'Bibliology consultant'. What's a tech firm like Rhine need with that?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You're in a good mood. I take it your experiments are going well?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Don't talk about experiments right now.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Ten minutes. A man like me only gets ten minutes to himself a day.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I could spend it on a video call with the children, or dinner with Elena and the others.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: But I prefer to spend it doing nothing but standing here and watching.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: It's just an ordinary street out there.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Yes. It's everything.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: They must be tired after a long day of work. Why is there no sign of dejection on their faces? Why are their steps so springy?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Because they have a chance.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: They believe their hard work is giving them a chance at better lives for them and their families.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Just like those Pioneers outside the city.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Yes, them too.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Trimounts. The city of three burdenbeasts.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Three burdenbeasts carried seven Pioneers to build the first settlement on this soil.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: And now? Look at the streets below.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The Pioneers and their descendants bring a constant stream of vitality to this place. No other country can claim to rival Columbia's enterprising spirit.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Our country's prosperity has given people confidence, which in turn feeds into our vitality.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: If the country keeps advancing, so will the lives of everyone across all the lands.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I know what you think of me. You, Kristen, Saria... you call me an opportunist.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: It takes a smart man to take a chance when he comes across it.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I can't deny that I would rather be up here than down there.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: But I've earned the chances I've been given.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: My projects have generated wealth, which fed into the next project, and driven technological progress.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: We stand on the cutting edge, leading Terra into a new era.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: They will build monuments, and our names will be immortalized upon them.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Our?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Victory belongs to each and every trailblazer.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: My ten minutes are almost up.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You didn't give me any time to talk.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I know what you came for, Ho'olheyak.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I forgive you.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Kristen, Muelsyse, Saria, Parvis... and you. I'm not wasting my time trying to guess your petty little thoughts.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Dorothy's experiments are one step away from success.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: All I care about is the final result.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: S-Sonny...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Dorothy says we're safe here... why do you have your crossbows out?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Safe?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You're not stupid, Doctor.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The biggest danger is right there.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: ...Dorothy?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I thought you were willing to hear us out?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Out of the way, you and the other docs. We're not here for you.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: We've been tricked, Elena.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Stopping the attack on Joyce was just a show.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: He showed us his anger, his hesitation, and his bottom line, all of this to hide one thing.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: He was always prepared to commit a crime.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I didn't think it'd be Myers. The whole part of making you trust me... especially Dr. Urbica... I was gonna make Sam play the bad guy.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: But that's all behind us now.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We're here, right at the source.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You planned the kidnapping and came all the way here to kill me?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: May I ask... why?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: A voice so soft it could melt the hardest heart.
Watery eyes opened slightly wide.
Filled with innocence, surprise, even hurt.
As though it was those who picked up arms to defend themselves who should be reproached.
Why? You can still ask why?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I saw the whole it all.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The monsters you made, stalking us. How you fed them the blood of my friends.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You... evil...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: There are no monsters!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Those are byproducts of the experiments, made of a special material that's sensitive to neural signals...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: No, Elena. He's not making a blind guess.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It really does seem like he's seen those silver things before.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And more.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Three days ago, I snuck into the lab complex to find you.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I wanted to ask if I could volunteer to be a test subject.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sir! Didn't you say it was too risky? That the corps could be lying to us?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Risky? Haha... hahaha!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sorry, Sam. I was the one lying.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: But I wanted to fix my mistakes.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Listen, everybody.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I saw silver monsters taking shape around her that night. She talked to them like they were her pets.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Dorothy Franks is the one behind all this.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Do you find it hard to accept what I'm telling you?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Can't say I'm into sci-fi.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Then maybe you could take a look at this letter.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Letter?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Mr. Sonny gave it to me. He might've known he'd be in danger.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: He said to me, and I quote, 'Give this letter to Mary Banner if anything happens to me.'
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I'm sure he wouldn't mind you reading it... a little early.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Give it to me.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Er... what does it say?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Where the hell did that guy go?!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: You don't know Sonny Romano, Greyy.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: He's a ball of anger and hate, all over his insurance.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Insurance again...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Yes, every Infected in Columbia deals with that word a lot.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: People outside think Columbia is kind enough to the Infected.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You get to live a normal life, as long as you can pay for your health insurance. That sounds pretty darned fair, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: That's what Sonny told me when he first got sick.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: But where did that end up?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Was it... very expensive?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: On a cop's salary? I couldn't afford it, even if I quit eating altogether.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: It wasn't meant to ensure keeping the Infected healthy. The premiums are way out of line with the treatment they actually get.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: It's more like a fine. Or a little trick that forces the Infected to down a certain path.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Sonny Romano never wanted to face the truth.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: If he's not stopped, he could end up going down a path you don't come back from.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: What you saw were neither monsters nor pets.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But they do have something to do with my experiments.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: So you admit it.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The truth will do you no good.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The more you know, the more danger you're in.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: People up high always like to make decisions for the little guy.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Why don't you put down those pointy things? My instruments can be fragile.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Or if you have to aim, aim this way.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I don't mind.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: She takes a step towards the Pioneers, almost touching the crossbows.
Sonny's hand trembles ever so slightly. He forces himself to look away from that warm pair of eyes.
This is a ploy. A trick to get them to submit again.
Aren't you afraid to die?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But I'm more afraid that you'll hurt yourselves.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You're not a murderer, Sonny, and neither are your friends. You're just ordinary men, trying to live better lives.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Didn't you consider participating in my experiments?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You still have a chance. Join us, and you'll get what you've always wanted.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'll never turn you down.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: She extends a hand to the Pioneers, as though waiting for them to clasp it.
Does she not understand that they came to kill her?
No. Don't look at her. Her eyes, her hands, they're too soft and warm.
They, the people who walk the barrenlands, have never known anything but cold refusal from the cities and those who live in them.
She is controlling them, like she controlled the others whose wills were weak.
But, the word 'chance'...
When was the last time we heard it?
Hm...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: It's those silver constructs!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Where did they come from? I didn't see...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sonny... was right.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This lab is where they were born.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: They're protecting Dorothy.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Stop. Don't hurt each other...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: It's coming!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: More over there!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Look out!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Grab Dorothy Franks—no, destroy the lab!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We gotta destroy this cradle of evil to stop the monsters, once and for all!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: That is the one thing that I will not permit.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The experiments must continue.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: It was my promise to you... to them.
attributes.name: Dorothy
